properties.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued February 29 at 3:48AM PST until February 29 at 5:00PM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* Changes...No significant changes.

* Affected Area...Fire Zone 453 West Central Nevada Basin and
Range.

* Winds...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 40 mph. Stronger
winds west of Highway 95.

* Humidity...12 to 20%.

* Duration...4 to 6 hours

* Impacts...The combination of gusty winds and low humidity can
cause fire to rapidly grow in size and intensity before first
responders can contain them.
properties.instruction:
Avoid outdoor activities that can cause a spark near dry
vegetation, such as yard work, target shooting, or campfires.
Follow local fire restrictions. Check weather.gov/reno for
updates and livingwithfire.info for preparedness tips.

NWSheadline: FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM PST THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR THE WEST CENTRAL NEVADA BASIN AND RANGE SOUTH OF INTERSTATE 80
